mods.abstract: Female, girl, bonnet doll, bisque shoulder head with bonnet, molded and painted features, blonde, blue eyes, cloth body with bisque forearms, cloth limbs with black flat sole shoes, white stockings, jointed at shoulders and hips, ribbon of bonnet is molded on front neck and painted with blue, white lace trimmed underwear, under-skirt, lavender(it was blue) drop-waist knee length dress, back opening, lace collar, front bodice with lace cover, pleated skirt has two layers, under layer has lace cover, blue velvet ribbon for waist bandAccompanying information describes as bisque doll with bonnet molded on headHead is older than bodyHead, made in 1890sMachine-madeRight forearm separated from bodyShoes were replaced.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
